................................. 
Time: 06 May 2005 
.................................

ATTN:SIR/MADAM

ASSISTANCE REQUIRED FOR ACQUISITION OF ESTATE

 I  write to inform of my desire to acquire estates or
 landed properties in your country on behalf of the 
Director of Contract and Finance Allocations of the 
Federal Ministry of Works and Housing in Nigeria.

 Considering his very strategic and influential 
position,he want the transaction to be strictly
confidential as possible. He further wants his
identity to remain  undisclosed at least for now,
until the completion of  transaction. Hence our desire
to have an overseas  agent.

 I have therefore been directed to inquire if you 
would agree to act as our overseas agent in order to 
actualize this transaction. The deal in brief is that
the funds  with which we intend to carry out our
proposed investments  in your country is presently in
a coded account at the  Nigeria Apex bank (Central
Bank of Nigeria) and we  need your assist ance to
transfer the funds to your country  in a convenient
bank account that will be provided by you  before we
can put the funds into use in your country.

 For this, you shall be considered to have executed a 
contract for the federal ministry of Works and 
Housing in Nigeria for which payment should be
effected to you  by Ministry, The contract sum of
which shall run into  US$28M (Twenty Eight Million
Dollars) of which your share shall be 25% if you 
agree to be our overseas agent.

As soon as payment is effected, and the amount 
mentioned above is successfully transferred into your
account,  we intend to use our own share in acquiring
some estates  and setting up trust accounts abroad.
For this too you  shall also serve as our agent.

 In the light of this, I would like you to forward to 
me the following information's:

 1. Your company name and address if any.
 2. Your personal fax number.
 3. Your personal telephone number for easy 
communication.

You are requested to communicate your acceptance of
 this proposal through this email address:
paullaye@terramail.com.sv.

After which we shall discuss in details the 
modalities for seeing this transaction through.
 Your quick response will be highly appreciated. Thank
 you in anticipation of your cooperation.

Yours faithfully,
Mr.Paul Laye.

<paul_laye2001@yahoo.it>


ATTN: SIR,

First and foremost, I must stress that our intention
here is to establish a long lasting business
partnership.

I am the Principal Partner of this transaction. We
to avail you the complete details of the
transaction.We have completed negotiations within
all the parastatals involved for the smooth
conclusion of transfering the funds form it's
location in Nigeria to its final destination bank
with clearance from the Central Bank of Nigeria. 

This transaction is now at the stage where it only
requires us to complete our responsibilities with
your cooperation. I am very sure that this
transaction will benefit you as well as me and our
families and all partners we intend to involve. The
origin, source and reason for this payment will be
provided to your bankers at the point of transfer.

You have my 100% assurance that all the legal
justification, reason for payment and documents
confirming the purpose of payment will be sent along
with the funds during the transfer to fully convince
your bankers and government that the transfer is
legitimate.

We shall also secure Vetting approval from the
office of the Attorney General and Minister of
Justice of the Federal Republic of Nigeria to show
that the funds does not violate international law or
the UN arbitration whatsoever.

In furtherance of our desire for a 100% risk free
accomplishment of this project, we intend to bring
all the processes of the fund release within the
frame of an actual fund release for a contract
officially perceived to have been executed by you
for the Federal Ministry Of Works and Housing(FMWH).
The funds would therefore be released by the Central
Bank of Nigeria in her capacity as the banker to all
Statutory corporations in my country of which the
FMWH is one.

In effect, the general perception of all government
establishment concerned with the issuance of
Approvals for the release of the funds would be that
of approving a contract payment to believed to have
been done by you.

You are therefore able to appreciate the magnitude
of confidentiality required to be maintained by us
all, as this is of paramount importancy for a 100%
risk free project guaranteeing our enjoyment of all
the proceeds of the project with absolute piece of
mind.

We have to incorporate any company we are going to
use to front into the legal system with the
Corporate Affairs Commission here and as well
register it with the Federal Ministry of Works and
Housing (FMWH) as certified contractor whom can
execute a contract of such magnitude.

We have to back - date the registration to tally
with the actual time this contract was actually
awarded and executed. As soon as this certificates
are out, we shall forward a copy to you for your own
perusal after which we will file application for
claims with the use of your bankers information.

To buttress the authenticity of the funds released,
we intend to bring all aspects of the project within
the realms of all laid down proceedures as obtained
in proper contractual payment transfer, thus giving
the project and the transfer itself all legitimacy,
ensuring total consistency with all legal
requirement.

Our sole yardstick for conducting the affairs of
this project, is the necessity of enjoying the
proceeds with absolute peace of mind now and in the
future. On this,we have on iota of doubt,as to our
perfect disposition as well as capacity in this
regard, and we would not have engaged in this
project if we were not more than 100% confident in
our ability to bring our desire to fruition provided
that you being the officially recognized beneficiary
of the funds adhere strictly, religiously,
accordingly and promptly to all our instructions as
originators of the project, and also having you as
our partner in all totality of confidence, good
faith and trust, with a view to a course for mutual
and satisfactory benefits, as set out in the ratio
of the funds disbursement in our letter to you.

We therefore crave your indulgence very much on this
good faith, and pray and hope sincerely that you
will not let us down.In the interest if ensuring
absolute confidentiality, particularly at this
stage,we advise that for the time being, you should
stay out of any and all discussions with any persons
and your bankers in respect of the funds arrival
until we advise otherwise, which will apparently be
at a stage considered safe enough for our peace of
mind as the direct participants of the Project. 

As top career civil servant still in active
government service, we are super sensitive about the
project being a once in a life time opportunity for
us to better our lives and provide for our
children's future. We therefore believe that the
interest of the project, as well as our peace of
mind, would be better protected by the concealment
of this Project tacitly in the absolute knowledge of
the partners (you and us) only.

We guarantee in all totality that once this is
religiously adhered to by you, the 100% risk free
accomplishment of the project will not be
compromised. However, we are confident that within
10 to 14 working days, we will secure the Final
Approvals from the appropriate government ministries
and parastatals. You must not under any
circumstances inform or supply your bank or anybody
with any information about the project until such a
time will advise.

Our code of operation is "Partnership protection
first", live a low key lifestyle, and remember,
"Loose lips Sink Ships". We have the express
capability to accomplish this project and you must
rely on this, because this is a sensitive project
for which we have put in so much commitment.

We therefore insist on strict confidentiality hoping
that you can be trusted.

Thank you so much for your intrest as we urgently
await your reply.

God bless you.

Best Regards,

Mr.Paul Laye.

NB:

PLEASE FURNISH US WITH A LITTLE AUTOBIOGRAPHY OF
YOURSELF,AGE AND WHAT YOU DO FOR A LIVING AND ALSO
THE COMPANY NAME YOU WANT TO US TO USE FOR THE
TRANSACTION.AS SOON AS WE RECEIVE THE NAME WE WILL
IMMEDIATELY START WITH THE REGISTRATION OF THE
COMPANY WITH THE CORPORATE AFFAIRS COMMISSION AND
PAY A THREE YEARS BACK DATED TAX ON THE COMPANY.WE
HAVE SECURED A SMALL LOAN TO COVER THIS EPENSES AS
THE FUNDS IN QUESTION IS STILL IN A CODED ACCOUNT
WITH THE CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA AND CANNOT BE TOUCH
UNTILL IT ARRIVES TO IT'S FINAL DESTINATION WHICH IS
YOUR BANKERS.

HERE ARE MY TELEPHONE NUMBERS :OFFICE:+234 1 435
9043 MOBILE:+234 803 32 80853.AS I EQUALLY EXPECT TO
YOURS ON YOUR REPLY.

May 11


Dear Sir,

My name is Marvin Marshyn, although I prefer to be
called by the name Commander X-2. 

I was born in the Valles Marineris region in 1948.  I
live with my dog K-9 and I have come here because of
the obstruction of my view of Venus.  I am affilated
witht the ACME weapons co., manufacturer of the ACME
Disintegrator and the revered Illudium Q-36 Explosive
Space Modulator.  My mission has however been hindered
by the actions of one  B. Bunny who has so far proved
resistent to the the disintegrator.  This fund would
be very handly in overcoming the shortcomings of the
Illudium Pew-36 Explosive Space Modulator which will
allow me to bring my mission to fruition.  You must
communicate to me via this crude form of type, email
as it is referred to, as the short and long wave
disturbences have rendered my intergalactic
telecommunicator unreliable.

I am hesitant to enter a pact with earthlings but you
have assured me that you are trustworthy so we may
proceed as you recommend.

Marvin Marshyn

messages.subject: We are ALL Agog
messages.body:
Mr. Paul, 

My partners here at the ACME weapons company are all
agog at the prospect of correcting the Illudium Q-36
Explosive Space Modulator.

Our latest test yesterday was rather disappointing. 
After initiating the modulator to funtion, there was
no KABOOM.  There was supposed to be an
earth-shattering KABOOM.  This made me very angry,
very angry INDEED.

I await your electronic mail communication. We must
work together to fix this naughty specimen so we can
complete our mission.

Commander X-2  

But then, losing patience...

Mr. Paul,

My partners here at the ACME weapons company are all agog at the prospect of correcting the Illudium Q-36 Explosive Space Modulator.

Our latest test yesterday was rather disappointing. After initiating the modulator to funtion, there was no KABOOM. There was supposed to be an earth-shattering KABOOM. This made me very angry, very angry INDEED.

I await your electronic mail communication. We must work together to fix this naughty specimen so we can complete our mission.

Commander X-2

But then, losing patience...

I do believe the earthling is somewhat reluctant to work with Martians. Perhaps I can convince him to assist me in the the destruction of the elusive wascally wabbit.

messages.body:
Mr. Paul,

General E.M.C. Squared has just informed me that
rather than being and earthling, you really come from
the planet MUGU.  This planet consists of lower life
forms that claim to have access to large sums of
money, but really are all just criminals.  

He said the MUGUS use a tired old scam that was
originally perpetrated discovered through ancient fax
machines, but now unemployed MUGU's sit around in
internet cafes all day trying to desperately trick
people into sending them money via Western Union.  

This is not legal, and threfore I will have to find
the funds I need to perfect the Illudium Q-36
Explosive Space Modulator elsewhere, no thanks to you
MUGUS.

Commander X-2
